name: mvc-group-project
description: Currency Converter App is a Node.js and Express-based web application designed to simplify currency conversions for users. With the integration of Mongoose for data storage and EJS for dynamic views, this application provides a seamless experience for users to input their desired currency conversion, obtaining accurate and up-to-date results. Whether for travel planning or financial analysis, our app offers a user-friendly interface and efficient conversion functionality. Explore the world of currencies effortlessly with Currency Converter App.
